comments:
build 20020409 - Linux Mandrake 8.2 - KDE 2.2.2

Running a runtime workbench, created a Java Project and got the attached log.
I believe I've got the same thing on Windows XP.

I don't know if the fix was included in build 20020411. So, as I've got the 
problem again with this build, I'm adding the stack trace. This time I've got 
when switching to the Java Perspective (I've had one plug-in and one fragment 
projects created).


org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable

Is the "org.eclipse.jdt.debug.ui" plug-in present in the workbench you are 
running?
No. Should that solve the problem?

Yes, it is required for debugging java code. This bug has been fixed in HEAD, 
but for this to work in 20020411, you have to have the java debug ui plug-in.
